name: Escort the tank
description:
Get to the research facility!

Use 1,2,3,4 to switch between soldiers.

Aim with the mouse.

Left click to fire.

Right click to zoom.

Ammo recharges over time.

Music by

Organic Grunge" Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com)
